mapper.insert: insert into tb_amect set uuid = #{uuid}, user_id = #{userId}, amount = #{amount}, type_id = #{typeId}, reason = #{reason}, status = 1
mapper.select: select uuid, user_id as userId, amount, type_id as typeId, reason from tb_amect where id = #{id}
mapper.update: update tb_amect set amount = #{amount}, type_id = #{typeId}, reason = #{reason} where id = #{id} and status != 2
